title: Lost Pillars of Enoch - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/5/21
itunes:title: Lost Pillars of Enoch - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/5/21
description:
George Noory and author Tobias Churton explore his research into the lost pillars of Enoch, a biblical character assigned to protect sacred knowledge, and how religion may be used to hide the rediscovery of the pillars to prevent the enlightenment of the world.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
